analysis.description:
TripleAlphaCrowdsalePreICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#459-485) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#483)

Reentrancy in TripleAlphaCrowdsalePreICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#459-485):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(contributor,amount) (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#472)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalWei (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#473-475)
odd in Stage.calcAmountAt (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#359) is a local variable never initialiazed

TripleAlphaCrowdsalePreICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#459-485) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(contributor,amount) (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#472)

TripleAlphaCrowdsalePreICO.finishCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#485-490) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#489-490)

FixedRate.rateETHUSD should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#308)
Stage._stageName should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#314-316)
Stage.mainCapInUSD should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#317-319)
Stage.period should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#323-324)
Stage.tokenPriceUSD should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#326)
TripleAlphaCrowdsalePreICO.minimalTokens should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#376-378)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#104) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/30/0x805268241cf0559eb5c1f610f016f549a77ca772.sol#84-86) is not in mixedCase
